item.content:encoded: Randomly ran across this really cool 3D map of the Local Stellar Neighborhood created with three.js.

item.title: Time Lapse of the City of Boston – Bodhi Films
item.dc:creator: anautonomousagent
item.description: This post is a mixture of art and science. Love this video – not just for the special effects, but for the perspective it gives the viewers. It helps to visually see how a city functions and operates. Some scenes provide a sort of visual omniscience. This is Boston from Bodhi Films on Vimeo.
item.content:encoded:
This post is a mixture of art and science. Love this video – not just for the special effects, but for the perspective it gives the viewers. It helps to visually see how a city functions and operates. Some scenes provide a sort of visual omniscience.


This is Boston from Bodhi Films on Vimeo.

item.title: D3 Data Driven Documents
item.dc:creator: anautonomousagent
item.description: A friend told me about D3 Data Driven Documents. This is an excellent site for anyone with a desire to display data in a unique and cool fashion on the internet. I will be updating my site, thebubbleindex.com with D3 js methods soon.
item.content:encoded: A friend told me about D3 Data Driven Documents. This is an excellent site for anyone with a desire to display data in a unique and cool fashion on the internet. I will be updating my site, thebubbleindex.com with D3 js methods soon.
